name: Countess Costantini
biography: Daughter of a Cleveland-based immigrant inventor and industrialist, Frieda Frasch married three times: first a fellow Clevelander; next an Italian Count, David Costantini; then a German Baron, Carl Gottlieb von Seidlitz. After leaving Cleveland in early adulthood, she lived continuously between New York, Paris, and Florence, even throughout the Second World War.
biography_75_words: Daughter of a Cleveland-based immigrant inventor and industrialist, Frieda Frasch married three times: first a fellow Clevelander; next an Italian Count, David Costantini; then a German Baron, Carl Gottlieb von Seidlitz. After leaving Cleveland in early adulthood, she lived continuously between New York, Paris, and Florence, even throughout the Second World War.
biography_50_characters: Cleveland-born socialite who married an Italian Count
